definitions.definition: A dominant nation or state that has control over the international affairs of a subservient state which otherwise has domestic autonomy .
A feudal landowner to whom vassals were forced to pledge allegiance .

main_definition: ( international politics ) A dominant nation or state that has control over the international affairs of a subservient state which otherwise has domestic autonomy .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A feudal landowner to whom vassals were forced to pledge allegiance .
